document.full_text: a recent meeting of the foreign ministers of russia, germany and poland may have signaled the start of a rapprochement among three countries with fundamentally different narratives of world war ii.
document.title: letter from europe: searching for a way to share history
lines_and_colors: a recent meeting of the foreign ministers of russia, germany and poland may have signaled the start of a rapprochement among three countries with fundamentally different narratives of world war ii.
